item.title: Episode Three: What a Tool

item.itunes:summary: Welcome to Side Quest Completed, the gamedev hobby podcast! Listen Now MP3 OGG Topics We talk about way too many TV shows Jerry Seinfield's "don't break the chain" calendar The pomodoro technique Putting personal stories into your games Practicing marketing by failing repeatedly The Storyshot Podcast PICO8 RenPy Unity Test …
item.description:
Welcome to Side Quest Completed, the gamedev hobby podcast!

Listen Now

MP3 OGG

Topics

  • We talk about way too many TV shows
  • Jerry Seinfield's "don't break the chain" calendar
  • The pomodoro technique
  • Putting personal stories into your games
  • Practicing marketing by failing repeatedly
  • The Storyshot Podcast
  • PICO8
  • RenPy
  • Unity
  • Test …
